question: a friend of yours is thinking of going on a camping holiday for the first time this summer. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:Explain why you think your friend would enjoy a camping holidayDescribe some possible disadvantagesSay whether you would like to go camping with your friend this summer
text: Hope you are doing well. I was so excited when I received your letter and told me that you were dreaming of having a campaign holiday. That is a wonderful decision.

In my view, after such a monotonous work you had at work, you need this holiday. Actually, it helps you to unwind and get relaxed. Your destination has spectacular and picturesque scenery as well it is known as the most beautiful tourist attraction. Undoubtedly, you will have memorable moments there.

That is to say, perhaps you find it a bit difficult if you know it gets pretty hot in the summer and you might not bear it. In addition, since it is far from a residential area you must bring bags of necessary items.so you may find it irritating to carry such a heavy staff.
I am keen on occupying you on this trip. It was just what the doctor ordered because I really need to recharge my batteries after such a hectic year.
Please let me know if your trip itinerary will be finalised. Hope to see you soon.
